    • 构造器详细资料

      • SignInControl

        public SignInControl​(javax.swing.JTextField usernameTextField,
                     javax.swing.JPasswordField passwordField,
                     javax.swing.JPanel contentPane,
                     javax.swing.JButton signInButton,
                     javax.swing.JButton quitButton,
                     javax.swing.JToggleButton memberNoSignInButton,
                     javax.swing.JLabel loginMessageLabel)
        Constructor.
        参数:
        usernameTextField - A JTextField collecting user input of username (or memberNo).
        passwordField - a JPasswordField collecting user input of password.
        contentPane - main panel of CustomerSignIn.
        signInButton - Select sign-in button
        quitButton - Select quit button.
        memberNoSignInButton - a JToggleButton indicating whether customer uses memberNo to sign in or not.
        loginMessageLabel - Shows some info when successfully logged in.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage​(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String password)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Invoke username-password checking procedure Utils.checkUserIDPassword(String, String, String).

        Get different message based on the return results.
        参数:
        id - username or memberNo
        password - the raw password collected. Will be MD5 encrypted in the following procedure.
        返回:
        String error message.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if something wrong happened in Utils.checkUserIDPassword(String, String, String)

      • setLoginMessageLabel

        public void setLoginMessageLabel​(java.lang.String message)
        Set loginMessageLabel of a specific message.
        参数:
        message - String to be set.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Invoked when buttons in CustomerSignIn are clicked.
        指定者:
        actionPerformed 在接口中 java.awt.event.ActionListener
        参数:
        e - the clicking event

      • setUsePhoneOrEmail

        public static void setUsePhoneOrEmail​(boolean setter)
        Set the flag for indicating whether use username or memberNo.
        参数:
        setter - boolean
